summary: I alwas hated how you couldn\'t remove the elder scroll, yet it weighed 20lbs. This mod corrects that. If there is any more quest books that cannot be removed that weighs anything, please post it as a comment, and i will add it to the mod.
descriptionHtml: I alwas hated how you couldn\'t remove the elder scroll, yet it weighed 20lbs. This mod corrects that. If there is any more quest books that cannot be removed that weighs anything, please post it as a comment, and i will add it to the mod.
author: Canderis
